name: xvpn
description: Browser-based secure proxy service with Auth0 and Cloudflare Workers

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd worker && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && echo 'Upload dist/ to your hosting service'

scripts.test: cd worker && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
